description: a(n) = floor(a(n-1)/2) if this is not among 0,a(1),...,a(n-2), else a(n) = 10*a(n-1).
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Rest@Nest[Append[#, If[MemberQ[#, c = Quotient[#[[-1]], 2]], 10*#[[-1]], c]] &, {0, 1}, 54] (* _Ivan Neretin_, Sep 06 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
